entry.title: 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig – Assorted
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 22.49

Handblown from the highest quality borosilicate glass, the 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig provides top-quality dabs in a compact, elegant, and user-friendly package.

 

  • High-quality Borosilicate Glass
  • Bell Beaker Design w/ Reinforced Base
  • Bent Neck w/ Rimmed Mouthpiece
  • Fixed Showerhead Percolator
  • 5mm Female Joint; Male Banger
  • Beautiful Fumed Glass Pattern
  • Available in a Variety of Assorted Colours

 

This compact-sized dab rig has a straightforward, functional design that is suitable to beginners and veteran smokers alike. The fumed glass patterns give it an elegant and mysterious look to enhance the dabbing experience. Its high-quality construction makes it a breeze to clean and maintain, ensuring that it will last for years with proper care.

If you’re in the market for a beautiful yet reasonably priced dab rig that delivers impactful hits every time, then the 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig will make a perfect addition to your collection.

entry.title: 14mm Male Clear Glass Herb Bowl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 3.90

This 14mm male clear glass herb bowl makes a great replacement for any bong or bubbler with a 14mm female joint. The bowl includes a disc-shaped glass handle that allows you to easily remove the bowl while in use without burning your fingers. The handle doubles as anti-roll protection, so your bowl will be safe on flat surfaces like tables and countertops.

The bowl is made from quality heat-resistant glass. It’s built to last and will be a reliable accessory for years with proper care.

 

  • 14mm Male
  • Glass-on-glass Joint
  • Fits 14mm Female Joints
  • Quality Heat-resistant Glass
  • Disc-shaped Handle
  • Anti-roll Protection

entry.title: 40TH ANNIVERSARY CHEECH & CHONG TIED STICK 10 IN EXTRACT WATER PIPE
entry.s:vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 49.99

Celebrate the original stoner movie in style, with the Cheech and Chong 40th Anniversary water pipe collection. We've created 6 limited edition pipes to celebrate the classic moments of the film. Each pipe is crafted from premium hand-blown borosilicate glass, and comes with an exclusive 40th anniversary collectors box.

Tied Stick

  • 10” Extract Water Pipe with slide-out ruffled percolator
  • Premium hand-blown borosilicate glass
  • Removable ruffled percolator for easy cleaning
  • Thick quartz banger
  • For novelty or use with legal essential oils only
entry.s:tag: Vendor_Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke

entry.title: San Rafael-Straight Tube Water Pipe-Blue-8in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 39.99

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

This simple straight tube rig is small enough to bring on the go, but perfect for at home sessions. Sitting 8”/20.32cm tall, this water pipe provides a cool draw and excellent water filtration. Made from handblown, borosilicate glass this piece comes equipped with a honeycomb percolator, that provides excellent diffusion and a super smooth draw. The fixed downstem and 14.5mm ground joint provide perfect positioning for the 14.5mm male quartz banger. Quartz is the ideal material to use for bangers as it heats up quickly and still maintains excellent flavour. This sturdy piece has a bullet-hole ice pinch, allowing you to pop in a couple cubes to ensure a chilly hit and frosty finish. 

This mainly clear piece has a sleek design with a pop of cool, blue colouring on the mouthpiece.  The classic San Rafael logo is perfectly placed above the ice pinch on the side making this rig an awesome addition to any connoisseurs collection.

entry.title: FAMOUS X STACK DAB RIG CLEAR 6 IN.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 35.99

Famous X launched a collection of dab rigs, featuring 3 unique shapes with percolators all taking a minimalistic approach of clear glass adorned with a black Famous Brandz star. Each piece comes in its own well-designed and functional box.

Stack is made from high quality, handblown borosilicate glass, and sits 6/15.24cm” tall. This simple, yet functional stacked sidecar style rig is easy to clean and maintain. It features an inverted showerhead percolator which adds diffusion and makes the your hit super smooth. Stack comes with a 14mm male quartz banger for optimal hits. Easier and more efficient than other attachments for rigs, quartz bangers also offer extreme heat tolerance making it the ideal choice.

If you are in the market for a sweet scientific-style rig for your dabbing needs look no further. Stack and all of the rigs in the new Famous X collection are the perfect additions to your collection.

entry.title: Dopezilla Dab Rig Banshee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dopezilla
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 30.99

Banshee

  • High quality borosilicate glass
  • Beaker base
  • 14.5mm Female Joint
  • Male 14.5mm quartz banger
  • Drum percolator
  • No carb hole
  • Colourful accents on the mouthpiece, bowl and monster logo

 

Dopezilla has launched a new collection that includes five horrifying dab rigs, all adorned with their own nefarious monster. The Banshee by Dopezilla is made from handblown borosilicate glass that can stand the test of time, delivered in its own matching custom box.

Listen closely and you can hear the Banshee’s wails, a clear straight tube dab rig with coloured accents on the mouthpiece, base and monster logo. The bent neck mouthpiece provides protection from splashback during your hit. Banshee features a drum percolator that makes your hit so smooth, you’ll be shrieking for more.

The 10” Banshee straight tube comes delivered with a male 14.5mm quartz banger. A banger is the preferred method for dabbing, making it easier and more efficient to use than typical accessories of the past.

If you’re looking for a solid and frightening straight tube dab rig to add to your glass collection, you have found your ideal piece. Purchase Banshee and the rest of the Dopezilla collection for the best available prices.

entry.title: Famous Design Dab Rig Versuz 8 inch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 39.99

Famous Brandz launched a new collection that includes six epic pieces: two dab rigs and four water pipes, all equipped with their own colorful or futuristic design. All of the pieces in this eye-catching collection are handcrafted from the thick borosilicate glass that is able to withstand the test of time, delivered in their own matching custom box.

Versuz is part of the collection and features swirling circular shapes with a fall favorite colorway on a stacked sidecar rig. It has a fixed re-enforced downstem to prevent accidents while cleaning and comes equipped with a honeycomb percolator. The percolator adds extra diffusion and provides a smoother, cleaner hit.

This 8” rig also includes a male 14.5mm quartz banger. A banger is the preferred method for dabbing, making it easier and more efficient to use than typical accessories of the past. Black accents on the mouthpiece and on the thick, stable base give this dab rig an even more sophisticated appearance.

entry.title: Famous Design Dab Rig Contact 10 inch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 39.99

Famous Brandz launched a new collection that includes six epic pieces: two dab rigs and four water pipes, all equipped with their own colorful or futuristic design. All of the pieces in this eye-catching collection are handcrafted from the thick borosilicate glass that is able to withstand the test of time, delivered in their own matching custom box.

Contact is part of the collection and features a luxe, gold webbing design on a straight tube rig. It has an 18.8mm ground joint and comes complete with a removable inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm diffused downstem for optimal filtration and a smoother hit. The ice pinch gives you the option of adding ice in the neck, perfect for those who like a cooler smoke.

This 10” rig also includes a male 14.5mm quartz banger. A banger is the preferred method for dabbing, making it easier and more efficient to use than typical accessories of the past. Black accents on the mouthpiece and on the thick, stable base give this dab rig an even more sophisticated appearance.

So if you are looking for a solid dab rig with an ice catcher and stunning design to expand your glass collection, this piece is ideal. Purchase Contact and the rest of the Famous Brandz collection, right here for the best available prices.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 39.99

Introducing Famous Glass, our new line of water pipes that combines timeless water pipe designs with trendy eye catching patterns. Featuring vibrant patterns, and bold graphics, these pipes jump out from the shelves and make a statement. Each pipe comes with a collectors edition gift box.

Surrender features our honey colored rig with our signature star and 3D drip pattern. Simple, bold and delicious.

Handcrafted from the highest quality thick borosilicate glass, our 10" water pipe feature a slitted downstem for smooth diffusion and easy removable cleaning.

Includes a thick quartz banger.
